elements.2211.03155_a48c63cafd917ba80412dd65ca18b: We have studied mathematical models of a very general class of chemical reaction systems consisting of two ACSs competing for a shared resource
elements.2211.03155_e0cfa9b77a31c081d913a7bd925f8: When enclosed within growing and dividing compartments, such a system is one of the simplest capable of exhibiting the heredity of its compositional state
elements.2211.03155_48785fc7fa9d310ff4d498b11b035: In other words, it can exhibit two distinct compositional states that are stable to the growth and division of the compartment
elements.2211.03155_f475299b484500b798deab9fe23d6: This, along with differential reproduction rates and some sources of variation of the compositional state, is a key property for a chemical system to form a Darwinian population
elements.2211.03155_ac3b5fc80c6385fdb650c1b6eb7ff: Our main result is that such bistable chemical systems exhibit the heredity of their two compositional states when the growth and division cycle parameters lie within certain critical bounds
elements.2211.03155_77dea33ceff519570c7d1b0cb081e: These are bounded by the critical values for these parameters in a serial dilution protocol
elements.2211.03155_cc4ebe3198811102970167e6a92a5: Thus, a serial dilution experiment, which is much easier to set up in a laboratory than a general growth and division scenario, can be used to test whether a given autocatalytic chemical system can exhibit heredity of its compositional states
elements.2211.03155_96ebf2f93f92ac952413b541ca1e5: We used these results to analyze a chemical system based on the
elements.2211.03155_76188646eeb61bc4b7374ce041987: ribozyme, which has been realized experimentally, and predicted that it would indeed exhibit heredity under serial dilution for a specific range of values for the dilution interval and dilution factor (see Results section
elements.2211.03155_3ec3cacb66852620895c3e83bdb6f: system is a particularly intriguing experimental system for studying heredity because it can go beyond our present theoretical analysis in two ways:
elements.2211.03155_bbeeda90cc95566f8a6374178dd2a: (i) It can be engineered to exhibit any number of compositional states
elements.2211.03155_34a1dcf652ef7846db6f7f57f6c8a: For example, by choosing bases M and N to be AU, UA, CG, and GC, one can have four ACSs competing for the same resource
elements.2211.03155_45dc974ab9072a9aba418d3caf3cb: Such a system can encode more than 1-bit of information
elements.2211.03155_5337e59a8d8508532608c87adc3b8: (ii) Each compositional state can be composed of a large number of chemical species
elements.2211.03155_a43e7adf5f8dcc97b01fc1f1f867b: ribozyme can catalyze not only the formation of itself but also the production of diverse RNA sequences
elements.2211.03155_b84f509d22f75b913cfbf1c77f653: Here, self-reproducing ribozymes (ACSs) correspond to the `autocatalytic cores,' and the sequences produced by the ribozyme correspond to their `peripheries'
elements.2211.03155_9555087d20b57f571da5ac4c9c15a: Species in the periphery can nevertheless play important roles, for instance, in the differential reproduction of the compositional states.
elements.2211.03155_eae92baebc19715fa6f0ce0331e88: Of course, extending our present theoretical analysis to multistable systems which can encode more than 1-bit of information and to more complex autocatalytic systems consisting of cores and peripheries is relatively straightforward, and easy to be implemented experimentally
elements.2211.03155_f189b8969f84f01015ba373225b21: system can guide such theoretical extensions, but we expect our core results to remain the same for such more complex reaction systems
elements.2211.03155_302d15bf9bff017eee2b895f030cd: The condition for bi/multistability of autocatalytic systems has been previously discussed in the context of self-reproduction and the origins of life
elements.2211.03155_403b396365fe710b43e593ff899ab: found a class of ACSs that exhibit bistability under CSTR conditions, with one state growing and the other a non-growing state
elements.2211.03155_0156bc70234e747d7b65a9d294732: Remarkably, their network model also needs two steps to show bistability (if mass-action kinetics is assumed), like the
elements.2211.03155_d0bd32263b63e516aef7b69403681: Note that the bistability in their model needs high catalytic efficiency of self-catalysts (e.g.,
elements.2211.03155_35d8bb9c69162bb4b41106efd4d75: It is noteworthy that our model exhibits bistability even with relatively low efficiency of catalysts (or equivalently, with a high rate of background reactions), which is more plausible for a prebiotic scenario
elements.2211.03155_ee8773812536c3935e3f607d3c403: Some previous studies have shown how heredity of composition can arise even without bistability due to the difference in reproduction rate and competition between compartments
elements.2211.03155_887bd90838656ac68f38770c52305: However, such mechanisms require fine-tuning for protocols, such as the size of compartments, and it is controversial whether the compositional states can be sustained enough for selection pressures to act on them
elements.2211.03155_279fb9a960d9310da082868479eb8: In contrast, we demonstrated that compositional information in our models is robustly inherited in a single lineage of compartments across a wide range of values for kinetic constants or protocol parameters
elements.2211.03155_2e14b8b423bbf153f88c6a8363a0b: Note that compartments such as coacervates are known for their high permeability, and they exchange their contents (including large ribozymes) at faster rates
elements.2211.03155_facaec4fa370bfb42055c712d6310: Even in such a case, the inheritance of compositional information could be robust for the kind of bistable systems we have studied.
